heading: Danger warning
text:
Every licensed sign hanger shall, while sign hanging operations are in progress at a job site, place
  conspicuously at such job site two plates or signs not less than 18 inches (457 mm) by 24 inches (610 mm) in size (i) displaying
  the word “danger” in letters not less than 6 inches (152 mm) high, and (ii) disclosing the sign hanger’s name, business addre ss,
  type of license and license number.
